metadata.title: CVE-2021-40490 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition was discovered in ext4_write_inline_data_end infs/ext4/inline.c in the ext4 subsystem in the Linux kernel through 5.13.13.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40490` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-89-generic - 5.4.0-89.100
linux-image-5.4.0-89-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-89.100
